text: Yaduvanshi Rai was an Indian politician. He was elected as a member of Bihar Legislative Assembly from Marhaura constituency in Saran district, Bihar. ==Death== Rai died on 13 September 2016 in Medanta, Gurugram, Haryana ==Legacy== * His son (Jitendra Kumar Rai) active in politics and currently MLA from Marhaura constituency in Bihar Legislative Assembly. ==References== ==Other websites== * यदुवंशी राय मेमोरियल मल्टी स्पेशलिटी हॉस्पिटल Category:Year of birth missing Category:2016 deaths Category:Bihari politicians
title: Yaduvanshi Rai
